org.cmg.resp.comp
Class Node.NodeMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.cmg.resp.protocol.MessageHandler
      org.cmg.resp.comp.Node.NodeMessageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
Node
public class Node.NodeMessageHandler
extends MessageHandler
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is the thread that is instantiated when a node receives a new message.

Author:
Michele Loreti

          Creates an instance that is devoted to handle message m.
